title: Chelsea Handler
description:
This week Kevin sits down with comedian and friend Chelsea Handler. They talk about their work together on her show Chelsea Lately, how she used the show to give comedians their moment in the spotlight, how her stand-up has changed as she’s gotten older, and what she hopes to do next in the entertainment industry.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Chelsea Handler)
